sentences.english: They have retrained a number of young technicians for our factory.
sentences.chinese: 他们为我厂再培训了一些年轻的技术员。

sentences.english: Currently Sharp does not make compressors, a key air conditioner component.
sentences.chinese: 现在的夏普公司没有自己专门的压缩机厂。

sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前镀锌厂将被删除，将在其位置上兴建的六辊轧机。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the relationship between the Ma Wusu sands control and particle board′s building.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了毛乌素沙地治理与刨花板厂建设的关系。

sentences.english: An edible factory with annual production of 2000 tons is planned to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 拟建山野菜速冻保鲜厂一座，年加工能力2000吨。

sentences.english: Application of laminar spray cooling system in Plate Mill of Shougang Group Co.
sentences.chinese: 层流冷却系统在首钢中厚板厂的应用。

sentences.english: Phil removed his old furniture from the house and took it to the dump.
sentences.chinese: 菲尔清除厂屋内的旧家具并拿到垃圾场去丢厂。

sentences.english: The manufacturer shall provide the factory quality certification and factory check out report with testing data.
sentences.chinese: 供应商提供的出厂合格证书和厂内试验报告。

sentences.english: Our work grows out of a small blast furnace plant which is set up in1913.
sentences.chinese: 我们厂的前身是一家小炼铁厂，建于1913年。

sentences.english: It has just come to our notice that the Japanese camera canon manufactured by seiki- kogaku, tokyo, is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 久闻东京精机光学厂生产的“佳能”照相机颇有名气。

sentences.english: Our factory has taken to making children's boots.
Another Honda factory in Guangzhou produces Jazz sedans for export.
sentences.chinese: 另一个在广州的本田厂用来生产出口的爵士轿车。

sentences.english: So many copies were sold that the factory was producing 320,000 copies of the record every day.
sentences.chinese: 唱片的销路非常好，以致唱片厂的日产量达32万张。

sentences.english: To share credit information of credit customer with bottler.
sentences.chinese: 与太古可口可乐各个装瓶厂分享信用客户信用信息。

sentences.english: This topic from fibreglass plant transformation projects of Jiujiang Changjiang fiberglass factory.
sentences.chinese: 本次课题来源于九江长江玻璃纤维厂改造工程。

sentences.english: The PC series are the reels we specially developed in the recent period.
sentences.chinese: PC系列是我厂最近针对性开发的线盘。

definition: to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
